article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 193 people killed since Friday.
sentence: Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  193  people  killed  since  Friday.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 193 people killed since Friday.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  193  people  have  been  killed  since  Israel  resumed  strikes  on  the  Strip  on  Friday.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 193 people killed since Friday.
sentence: According  to  the  ministry,  the  number  of  people  killed  in  Gaza  has  exceeded  15,000  and  more  than  40,000  injured  -  70%  of  whom  it  says  are  women  and  children.
